ch.epfl.lis.gnw
Class RandomParameterGaussian

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lis.gnw.RandomParameter
      ch.epfl.lis.gnw.RandomParameterGaussian

public class RandomParameterGaussian
extends RandomParameter

Generate random values from a Gaussian distribution within the interval [min max]. If not set explicitly, the mean is the center of the interval (min+max)/2 and the standard deviation s (stdev_) so that the interval is 6 standard deviations (max-min) = 6*s. This implies the following distribution of the generated values: ... mean +1s +2s +3s (=max) ------|-------|-------|-------|---------> ... | 34.1% | 13.6% | 2.1% | Set the appropriate flag to use a log-normal distributions (note, the parameters must be given on the linear scale, and the result is also returned on linear scale)

Author:
Daniel Marbach (firstname.name@gmail.com)

Constructor Summary

          Constructor, mean_ and stdev_ are set according to the specified interval (see class documentation above)

          Constructor, mean_ and stdev_ are set explicitly

Method Detail

getRandomValue

public double getRandomValue()
Draw a new random number from the distribution. If the parameters were given on log-scale and paramsOnLogScale_ is set, the result is transformed back to linear scale.

Specified by:
